metadata.title: CVE-2023-34396 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Allocation of Resources Without Limits or Throttling vulnerability inApache Software Foundation Apache Struts.This issue affects Apache Struts:through 2.5.30, through 6.1.2. Upgrade to Struts 2.5.31 or 6.1.2.1 orgreater

criterions.comment: libstruts1.2-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
